page.title: 14CLUBS
page.content:
THE FOLLOWING CLUBS MEET IN THE VILLAGE HALL:- {THE SOCIAL CLUB} CLUB NIGHTS THURSDAY AND SATURDAY. TUESDAY-BINGO. DARTS MONDAY AND THURSDAY. {THE GOOD COMPANIONS.} MEET THE 3RD THURSDAY IN EACH MONTH. {COATES CRICKET CLUB.} THE CRICKET CLUB USE THE HALL FOR THEIR TEAS. { {THE HORTICULTURAL SOCIETY.} MEET ONCE A MONTH. {THERE IS A WHIST DRIVE ON WEDNESDAYS.}
OTHER GROUPS:- {WEDNESDAY WIVES.} MEET ONCE A FORTNIGHT IN PRIVATE HOMES. {LINK CLUB. } A CHURCH CLUB FOR CHILDREN HELD AT RODMARTON ONCE A MONTH.
